definition: life or death/fate/no matter what/anyway/for the life of me
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
to live/alive/living/work/workmanship
to act recklessly (idiom)
regardless of life or death (idiom)

sentences.english: To let us go first, the goat pounces on the wolves strongly.
sentences.chinese: 为了让我们先走，大山羊不顾死活地朝狼群扑了过去。

sentences.english: Is anyway not to put the sell those poor minke whales to hotel.
sentences.chinese: 还死活不放的把那些可怜的小须鲸拿到饭店出售。

sentences.english: Indesperation he jumped out of the window when he saw that the stairs were on fire.
sentences.chinese: 当他看到楼梯着了火便不顾死活从窗口跳了出去。
囚犯们在绝望中更加不顾死活了。

sentences.english: The prisoners grew more desperate in despair.
sentences.chinese: 囚徒们在绝望中更加不顾死活了。

sentences.english: Sell the home however anyway does not admit, insisting stubbornly is my bang up.
sentences.chinese: 卖家却死活不承认，硬说是我弄坏的。

sentences.english: People who run government don't care about people like us.
sentences.chinese: 政府里那些人不会管我们这种人的死活。

sentences.english: Ji Ming Wang Lin came to the door, Wang Lin wouldn't let David went out the door.
sentences.chinese: 铭吉来到王琳门外，王琳死活不让大卫出去开门。

determined/unshakable
to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
from the start/absolutely/entirely/simply

to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing
to try one's very best to persuade sb (idiom)/to reason with sb in every way possible

to keep on saying (idiom); to repeat over and over again
just/simply/stubbornly/really
to heed/to pay attention to

to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of

to arbitrarily assert/to allege/to stick to one's statement/to cling to one's view
